pageContext.claim: “In the two years before my election, violent crime increased 8 percent. Murders were up by more than 20 percent, and going a lot higher, nationwide -- the steepest two-year consecutive increase in over 50 years. But with your help, all of that is changing and changing very rapidly.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a Four Pinocchio claim. A full look at the data shows the president is claiming credit for a long-term trend of declining violent crime.
